itemDescription: British swimmer, Olympic athlete, Commonwealth Games gold medallist

wikipedia_page.main: Michael J. "Mike" Richards (born 13 September 1950) is a male Welsh former competitive swimmer.

response: Michael Richards (born 1949) is an American actor best known for playing Cosmo Kramer on Seinfeld.
*Michael Richards, pseudonym used by writer D. C. Fontana (1939–2019) for two Star Trek episodes
*Michael Richards (engineer) (1673–1721), founder of the Royal Regiment of Artillery
